- Sure, I can help you with that! Here's an example of how you can create a mermaid diagram in code to plan a 2-month project scoping out a music app:
id:: 65a7adf6-eabb-43de-9882-ef5e4bd0bb15
  :LOGBOOK:
  CLOCK: [2024-01-17 Wed 11:21:05]--[2024-01-17 Wed 11:21:08] =>  00:00:03
  :END:
  ```mermaid
  graph LR
  A(Analyze Requirements) --> B(Define Features)
  B --> C(Design UI/UX)
  C --> D(Develop Frontend)
  D --> E(Develop Backend)
  E --> F(Test and QA)
  F --> G(Deploy to Production)
  G --> H(Monitor and Optimize)
  ```
  This diagram represents the typical flow of tasks involved in the project scoping phase for a music app. Feel free to customize it according to the specific requirements of your project.
  Is there anything specific you would like to add or modify in this diagram?
  make a gantt chart
- make me a mermaid diagram as code for a 6 month 2 person development epic to create an LLM based educational app
	- Sure! Here is a mermaid diagram as code for a 6 month 2 person development epic to create an LLM based educational app: ```mermaid graph TD A[Research and Planning] --> B[Design UI/UX] B --> C[Develop Backend] C --> D[Implement Features] D --> E[Test and Debug] E --> F[Refine and Optimize] F --> G[Deploy and Launch] ``` Please let me know if you have any additional information or if there's anything specific you would like to add to the diagram!
-

## Current Landscape (2025)

- Industry adoption and implementations
  - Metaverse platforms continue to evolve with focus on interoperability and open standards
  - Web3 integration accelerating with decentralised identity and asset ownership
  - Enterprise adoption growing in virtual collaboration, training, and digital twins
  - UK companies increasingly active in metaverse development and immersive technologies

- Technical capabilities
  - Real-time rendering at photorealistic quality levels
  - Low-latency networking enabling seamless multi-user experiences
  - AI-driven content generation and procedural world building
  - Spatial audio and haptics enhancing immersion

- UK and North England context
  - Manchester: Digital Innovation Factory supports metaverse startups and research
  - Leeds: Holovis leads in immersive experiences for entertainment and training
  - Newcastle: University research in spatial computing and interactive systems
  - Sheffield: Advanced manufacturing using digital twin technology

- Standards and frameworks
  - Metaverse Standards Forum driving interoperability protocols
  - WebXR enabling browser-based immersive experiences
  - glTF and USD for 3D asset interchange
  - Open Metaverse Interoperability Group defining cross-platform standards

- **Last Updated**: 2025-11-16
